manifest.author: Andrew Brereton
manifest.name: iCal
manifest.description: Scans your vault for tasks. Creates an iCal file and stores it on Gist. You can then show this calendar in any iCal compatible client such as Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.

manifest.author: jemstelos
manifest.name: Media Notes
manifest.description: Take notes on YouTube videos and podcasts with media controls and timestamps.

manifest.author: Johan Sanneblad
manifest.name: Featured Image
manifest.description: Automatically sets a featured image property in your notes based on the first image, YouTube link, or Auto Card Link image found in your document.

manifest.name: GPT Assistant
manifest.description: Use a GPT-3 based model on your notes and get personalized answers from your knowledge base.

manifest.name: Water Tracker

manifest.name: Journaling

manifest.name: File Cooker
manifest.description: Deal multi notes from Search results、current file、Dataview query string...

manifest.name: Editor Autofocus

manifest.name: Advanced Tables

manifest.name: Anchor Link Display Text

manifest.name: Waveform Player

manifest.name: Idealogs Annotator

manifest.author: seanlowe

manifest.description: Successor to darakah's Timelines plugin: Generate a chronological timeline in which all 'events' are notes that include a specific tag or set of tags.

manifest.author: Ryota Ushio

manifest.description: A powerful indexing & referencing system for theorems & equations in your vault. Bring LaTeX-like workflow into Obsidian with theorem environments, automatic equation numbering, and more.

manifest.author: Instapaper
manifest.name: Instapaper
manifest.description: Connect Obsidian to your Instapaper account.

manifest.author: Roland Broekema
manifest.name: VCF Contacts
manifest.description: Effortlessly manage, organize, and interact with your contacts. Import, export, and structure vCard (VCF) files seamlessly while keeping all contact details accessible in your knowledge base. Includes click-to-call, right-click copy, structured metadata, and more!

manifest.author: Jerry

manifest.name: SyncFTP

manifest.name: Hide Sidebars on Window Resize
manifest.description: Automatically hides the sidebars when your window is resized to be narrower
